backend/main.mo: Actor canister managing content blocks, staff, notices, gallery items, contact submissions, and user profiles with access‑controlled CRUD and upgrade persistence.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence linking features to files, components, and tests for the school website project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short summaries for two frontend notice‑related pages and admin sections.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/admin/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard rendering tabbed sections for managing content, staff, notices, gallery, and inquiries with logout support.
frontend/src/admin/sections/ContentBlock: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting content blocks using dialogs, tables, and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/admin/sections/GallerySecti: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting gallery items using dialog forms and mutations.
frontend/src/admin/sections/InquiriesSec: Displays contact form submissions with view and delete dialogs, including date formatting.
frontend/src/admin/sections/NoticesSecti: Admin interface to manage notices with add, edit, delete dialogs and date handling.
frontend/src/admin/sections/StaffSection: Provides CRUD management for staff members via dialogs and form inputs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all public pages and the admin page inside a shared SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/ContentBlock.tsx: Simple card component rendering a title and text content.
frontend/src/components/PublicNav.tsx: Responsive public navigation bar with active link highlighting and mobile drawer.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout with header, navigation, footer, and branding for the public site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContent.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admin CRUD operations on content blocks, staff, notices, gallery items, and contact submissions via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for managing login, stored identities, and auth-client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicContent.ts: Provides read-only public content hooks for fetching content blocks, staff, notices, gallery items, and submitting contact forms.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with a government-style color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page by loading three content blocks with skeleton fallbacks and default text.
frontend/src/pages/AcademicsPage.tsx: Renders the Academics page using three content blocks with loading states and predefined fallback content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin page handling password-based unlock, Internet Identity login, and admin check before rendering the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionsPage.tsx: Displays admissions process, requirements, and dates using dynamic content blocks with skeleton fallbacks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page with a form submission flow and optional dynamic contact info content block.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders a gallery grid from fetched gallery items with loading placeholders and image fallback handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero content, quick links, and dynamic welcome and mission content blocks.
frontend/src/pages/NoticeDetailPage.tsx: Shows details for a single notice including date, title, and body, with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/NoticesListPage.tsx: Displays a list of notices fetched from the API with loading skeletons and links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/StaffPage.tsx: Fetches and renders staff profiles in a grid with avatars, bios, and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, requirements, and image needs for a school website.
